{'Stainless Steel Water Bottle': {'price': 18.99, 'brand': 'HydroMax', 'category': 'Sports', 'product_id': 'P012', 'rating': 4.6, 'reviews': ['Keeps water cold all day.', 'No leaks so far.', 'Solid and well insulated.']}, 'Adidas Running Shoes': {'price': 80.49, 'brand': 'Adidas', 'category': 'Sports', 'product_id': 'P024', 'rating': 4.4, 'reviews': ['Very comfortable for daily training.', 'Good balance between cushioning and responsiveness.', 'Breathability is excellent.', 'A bit pricey but reliable.']}, "adidas Men's Essentials Feel Ready Training T-Shirt": {'price': 18.75, 'brand': 'Adidas', 'category': 'Sports', 'product_id': 'P029', 'rating': 4.6, 'reviews': ['Really nice color and fabric, soft and breathable.', 'Super comfortable and breathable shirt. I do not think it is moisture wicking.', 'I love white shirts because I can wear it with any color of my track suits.', 'Quality made products. The t-shirts go with anything and are ready for any situation.', 'I was a little bit worried about how durable would be the material but so far no complaints.']}, 'Adidas Mens Z.n.e. T-Shirt': {'price': 17.28, 'brand': 'Adidas', 'category': 'Sports', 'product_id': 'P030', 'rating': 4.3, 'reviews': ['Good fit, nice material.', "it's a sintetic shirt not the cotton as it was written in description.", 'The shirt came with yellow stains.', "Thicker material than other fitness shirts and good quality. I like these shirts as a larger gym shirt when it's cooler out, but not wearing while working out. Color is good along with value for money."]}, "Boys' Stay Dry Climalite Short Sleeve T-Shirt": {'price': 13.3, 'brand': 'Adidas', 'category': 'Sports', 'product_id': 'P031', 'rating': 4.7, 'reviews': ['Super comfortable material, fit is true to size (see size chart and trust it). Loose fit. You have to pay attention to what type of shirt you are buying for sportswear. This is loose fit, not meant to be tight. Holds up after multiple washes, great value for the price. I re-buy every time one in a different color is available. The polyester mix material is great for people with sensitive skin. It is also light weight and breathable for hot days.', 'Excellent t-shirt from [Brand Name]! The cotton quality is superior, very soft to the touch, and the fit is perfect; neither too loose nor too tight. The color remains intact after several washes. Highly recommended!', 'Chego 5 dias antes material e o que vende está perfeita.', 'Well made. Fits true to size. Good color and quality. Comfortable and light weight. Washes well.']}, "Men's Park Short Sleeve T Shirt": {'price': 25.72, 'brand': 'Nike', 'category': 'Sports', 'product_id': 'P032', 'rating': 4.4, 'reviews': ['Very good quality shirt soft and comfortable!', "Fast shipping, good quality. I'm an XL in Nike and Adidas; however, this XL is a bit tight on me. The colors are very pretty.", 'I love these Nike shirts! The material is excellent quality — not too thin, not too thick, just the right weight. They keep cool and comfortable, which makes them perfect for my fiancé whether he’s working outdoors or heading to the kids’ sporting events. Versatile, breathable, and stylish. Definitely a great buy for the price!', 'A mi hijo le gustò esa playera.', 'Muy lindos y buena calidad la tela maravillosa coinciden las talla lo recomiendo 1010.', 'So I bought a “new” shirt. Fit is perfect and it looks great. The shirt was delivered without any tags and smelled like body odor. I ordered four and the other three smelled fine and did have the tags. It’s pretty obvious that this was a returned shirt that someone didn’t want and was purchased as new from me.']}, 'Nike Youth Park VII Short Sleeve Jersey, BV6742-010': {'price': 28.97, 'brand': 'Nike', 'category': 'Sports', 'product_id': 'P033', 'rating': 4.5, 'reviews': ['Great quality shirts! The size was accurate, providing a reliable, true-to-fit experience. They were nice and cool to wear, making them ideal for the summer months. My son loved them, and I would definitely purchase them again.', 'Love this shirt !!! Great panel back. Shirt holds it color.', 'Nicer than I expected. The Nike check is embroidered not just a vinyl. I will say the shirt is different than the Nike pro dri fit shirts but still a great shirt my son loves it.', 'My teen is pretty picky with the shorts he wears. The size was perfect. The soft gray color and quality fabric are a nice addition to the shirts he will wear. I bought it for the value for the money and the bonus was the breathabilty of the shirt. He asked me what other colors he could get it in next.']}}
